snippet: Kostas Vaxevanis, a magazine owner, was acquitted after publishing a list of Greeks who held Swiss bank accounts, but the prosecutor has appealed the verdict, calling it “legally mistaken.”
lead_paragraph: Kostas Vaxevanis, a magazine owner, was acquitted after publishing a list of Greeks who held Swiss bank accounts, but the prosecutor has appealed the verdict, calling it “legally mistaken.”

headline.seo: Kostas Vaxevanis, Cleared of Privacy Violations, Faces Retrial
headline.main: Greek Publisher, Cleared of Privacy Violations, Faces Retrial
headline.print_headline: Greek Publisher, Cleared of Privacy Violations, Faces Retrial
